select 'setItemAllowNulls(this, ''so_pn'', false);' as message return
&XMLFlowFilterCommand;
declare @table nvarchar(32), @q nvarchar(4000), @siteKey nvarchar(4000), @partition nvarchar(6), @$none nvarchar(512), @retrieveID varchar(128), @retrieveLine varchar(3), @key nvarchar(4000), @vcNumber varchar(32), @unitKey nvarchar(4000) declare @t varchar(128), @unit varchar(128), @i int, @l int, @c smalldatetime, @result nvarchar(1024), @baseCurrency varchar(32), @startYear int
select @vcNumber = ltrim(rtrim(case when @loai = '9' then @so_pn else @so_ct end)) select @i = len(@vcNumber), @l = character_maximum_length from information_schema.columns where table_name = 'r70$000000' and column_name = 'so_ct' select @vcNumber = space(@l - @i) + @vcNumber, @c = @ngay_ct1 select @startYear = nam_bd from dmstt
select @$none = case when @@language = 'v' then N'Không có phiếu nhập theo điều kiện đang lọc.' else N'No data matching filter condition.' end &CheckRelativeProcess;
select @unit = case when @ma_dvcs = '' then @@unit else @ma_dvcs end
if @stt_rec_id = '' begin create table #temp (stt_rec varchar(32), stt_rec0 varchar(32)) exec AI_ERP$System$GetSiteFilter 'ma_kho', @ma_kho, null, @@userID, @@admin, @siteKey output if @loai = '9' begin select @unitKey = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetUnitFilter('a.ma_dvcs', @unit, @@userID, @@admin) select @key = 'ma_ct = '''' and nam = ' + rtrim(@startYear) select @key = @key + ' and a.ngay_ct >= ''' + convert(char(8), @ngay_ct1, 112) + '''' select @key = @key + ' and a.ngay_ct < ''' + rtrim(year(@ngay_ct2)) + '0101''' select @key = @key + ' and a.ma_vt = ''' + replace(rtrim(@ma_vt), '''', '''''') + '''' if @ma_kho <> '' select @key = @key + ' and a.ma_kho = ''' + replace(rtrim(@ma_kho), '''', '''''') + '''' if @ma_vi_tri <> '' and not exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_kt_td_vitri_yn' and val = '0') select @key = @key + ' and ma_vi_tri = ''' + replace(@ma_vi_tri, '''', '''''') + '''' if @ma_lo <> '' and not exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_kt_td_lo_yn' and val = '0') select @key = @key + ' and ma_lo = ''' + replace(@ma_lo, '''', '''''') + '''' if @unitKey is not null select @key = @key + ' and exists(select 1 from dmkho c where a.ma_kho = c.ma_kho and ' + replace(@unitKey, 'a.', 'c.') + ')' if @siteKey is not null select @key = @key + ' and ' + @siteKey
select @q = 'insert into #temp select top 1 stt_rec_nt, stt_rec0 from cdntxt a' select @q = @q + ' where so_ct = ''' + replace(@vcNumber, '''', '''''') + ''' and ' + @key exec sp_executesql @q end else begin while (month(@c) + year(@c)*12) <= (month(@ngay_ct2) + year(@ngay_ct2)*12) begin select @table = 'r70$' + convert(char(6), @c, 112), @c = dateadd(month, 1, @c)
select @q = 'insert into #temp select top 1 stt_rec, stt_rec0 from ' + @table select @q = @q + ' where so_ct = ''' + replace(@vcNumber, '''', '''''') + ''' and ma_ct = ''' + replace(@ma_ct, '''', '''''') + '''' select @q = @q + ' and ma_dvcs = ''' + replace(@unit, '''', '''''') + '''' select @q = @q + ' and ngay_ct between ''' + convert(varchar(8), @ngay_ct1, 112) + ''' and ''' + convert(varchar(8), @ngay_ct2, 112) + ''''
select @q = @q + ' and ma_vt = ''' + replace(@ma_vt, '''', '''''') + '''' if @ma_kho <> '' select @q = @q + ' and ma_kho = ''' + replace(@ma_kho, '''', '''''') + '''' if @ma_vi_tri <> '' and not exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_kt_td_vitri_yn' and val = '0') select @q = @q + ' and ma_vi_tri = ''' + replace(@ma_vi_tri, '''', '''''') + '''' if @ma_lo <> '' and not exists(select 1 from options where name = 'm_kt_td_lo_yn' and val = '0') select @q = @q + ' and ma_lo = ''' + replace(@ma_lo, '''', '''''') + '''' if @siteKey is not null select @q = @q + ' and ' + @siteKey
exec sp_executesql @q if exists(select 1 from #temp) break end end select @retrieveID = isnull(stt_rec, ''), @retrieveLine = stt_rec0 from #temp drop table #temp
if @retrieveID = '' begin select 'so_ct' as field, @$none as message return end end else select @retrieveID = left(@stt_rec_id, 13), @retrieveLine = right(@stt_rec_id, len(@stt_rec_id) - 14)
select @retrieveID = replace(@retrieveID, '''', ''), @retrieveLine = replace(@retrieveLine, '''', '') select @table = c$ from dmct9 where ma_ct = @ma_ct
create table #partition (partition varchar(6)) select @q = 'insert into #partition select convert(char(6), ngay_ct, 112) from ' select @q = @q + @table + '000000 where stt_rec = ''' + @retrieveID + '''' exec sp_executesql @q
select @partition = partition from #partition drop table #partition
select @baseCurrency = isnull(rtrim(val), '') from options where name = 'm_ma_nt0' create table #t (c varchar(1024))
if @loai = '9' begin declare @roundPriceFC int, @roundPrice int select @roundPriceFC = val from options where name = 'm_round_gia_nt' select @roundPrice = val from options where name = 'm_round_gia' select @q = 'insert into #t select top 1 case when ma_nt = '''' then '' '' else ma_nt end + '',''+''' + @baseCurrency + '''+'','' + stt_rec_nt + '','' + stt_rec0 + '','' + cast(case when ton_kho01 = 0 then 0 else round(so_du_nt01/ton_kho01, ' + rtrim(@roundPriceFC) + ') end as varchar(33)) + '','' + cast(case when ton_kho01 = 0 then 0 else round(so_du01/ton_kho01, ' + rtrim(@roundPrice) + ') end as varchar(33)) as c from cdntxt a' select @q = @q + char(13) + 'where stt_rec_nt = ''' + @retrieveID + ''' and stt_rec0 = ''' + @retrieveLine + ''' and nam = ' + rtrim(@startYear) exec sp_executesql @q end else begin select @q = 'insert into #t select top 1 case when ma_nt = '''' then '' '' else ma_nt end + '',''+''' + @baseCurrency + '''+'','' + stt_rec + '','' + stt_rec0 + '','' + cast(gia_nt as varchar(33)) + '','' + cast(gia as varchar(33)) as c from r70$' + @partition select @q = @q + char(13) + 'where stt_rec = ''' + @retrieveID + ''' and stt_rec0 = ''' + @retrieveLine + '''' exec sp_executesql @q end select @result = c from #t drop table #t
if @result is null begin select 'so_ct' as field, @$none as message return end
select '' as field, '' as message, 'on$&Identity;Filter$Retrieve$QueryComplete(this,''' + @result + ''');' as script return
